metadata.title: Key Management System
metadata.description: Manage your API providers and tokens

auth.title: Key Management System
auth.description: Sign in to manage your API providers and tokens

groups.title: GROUPS
groups.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this group? All items and tags will be deleted.
groups.deleteError: Failed to delete group. Please try again.
groups.saveError: Failed to save group. Please try again.

groupDialog.createDescription: // Initialize a new configuration node cluster.

groupItems.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
groupItems.deleteError: Failed to delete item. Please try again.

groupItemDialog.createDescription: // Add a new key-value pair to this group.
groupItemDialog.keyExistsError: This key already exists in this group
groupItemDialog.saveError: Failed to save item. Please try again.

shareDialog.title: SHARE_GROUP
shareDialog.publicShareDescription: Anyone with the link can view (no login required)
shareDialog.privateShareDescription: Only invited users can view (login required)
shareDialog.publicWarning: Public share links can be accessed by anyone. Do not share sensitive data.
shareDialog.atLeastOneEmail: Please add at least one email for private share

shares.title: MY_SHARES
shares.description: // Manage your shared groups and invitations
shares.noSharesDescription: You haven't shared any groups yet. Go to Groups and click the SHARE button to create your first share.
shares.revokeDescription: Are you sure you want to revoke this share? The share link will immediately stop working and all invited users will lose access.

shareView.defaultDeniedReason: You do not have permission to view this share
shareView.readOnlyAlert: This is a read-only share. You can view the content but cannot make changes.

acceptInvitation.loginDescription: Please login to accept this invitation
acceptInvitation.acceptedDescription: You now have access to this shared group. Redirecting...
acceptInvitation.inviteDescription: You have been invited to view a shared group. Would you like to accept this invitation?

rejectInvitation.processingDescription: Processing your response to the invitation
rejectInvitation.rejectedDescription: You have rejected this share invitation. You will not have access to the shared content.

validation.tagTooLong: Tag must be 50 characters or less
validation.tagInvalidChars: Tag can only contain letters, numbers, Chinese characters, hyphens, and underscores
validation.nameTooLong: Name must be 100 characters or less
validation.descriptionTooLong: Description must be 500 characters or less
validation.keyTooLong: Key must be 100 characters or less
validation.valueTooLong: Value must be 5000 characters or less
validation.privateShareEmailRequired: At least one email is required for private shares

email.inviteMessage: {inviterName} ({inviterEmail}) invites you to view the following Group:
email.readOnlyNote: This is a read-only share. You can view all configuration items in this Group.
email.warningNote: If you don't know the inviter, please ignore this email or click "Reject Invitation".
email.footer: This email was sent automatically by Key Management
